name: XOts
description:
a long time ago on a boring school day,everyone around me busy playing hand-cricket

(it was very famous that time),i had the crazy idea of combining XOX and dots and making a game out of it and i did ,my friends loved it lol and named it xots ,this game is very close to my heart and making it was a hell lotta fun ,the game is pretty intuitive 

oh and its 2 player only lol ,enjoy with your friends <3
